item.title: Portfolio
item.description: I am Naoya Furudono. Thank you for visiting this page. Links Twitter (@furudono2) AtCoder GitHub Academic Paper Open Floating in TFP2022 paper (submitted version, pdf): we are preparing the final version slide (pdf) 12min video (mp4) Talks 2022 Survey of hygienic macros slide (pdf) 2021 Progress about Open Floating slide (pdf) Survey the design and implementation of Julia slide (pdf) 2020 Mini-talk about my favorite beer slide (pdf)
